definitions.definition: The combined application of science and art in practical ways in industry , as for example in designing new machines .
examples: Humankind relies on technology to keep average standard of living higher than it would otherwise be.
We went to the trade show to see the latest technology on display.

definitions.definition: Any useful skill or mechanism that humans have developed or invented (including in prescientific eras).
examples: the incipient metalworking technology of the Bronze Age

definitions.definition: Any useful trait that has evolved in any organism.
The study of or a collection of techniques.
A discourse or treatise on the arts.

main_definition: The combined application of science and art in practical ways in industry , as for example in designing new machines .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Any useful skill or mechanism that humans have developed or invented (including in prescientific eras).
( countable , figurative ) Any useful trait that has evolved in any organism.
( uncountable , academic ) The study of or a collection of techniques.
( archaic ) A discourse or treatise on the arts.
